mapper.select: SELECT c.*, convert(content, char) content_str FROM bsp_productsregions a, bsp_productsregionssaleaddress b, bsp_saleaddress c where a.id = b.productregionsId and c.id = b.saleaddressId and a.RegionsId = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c.type = 1 limit 1;

SELECT sa.* FROM bsp_shipaddresses s, bsp_saleaddress sa, bsp_productsregions p, bsp_productsregionssaleaddress l WHERE sa.id = l.saleaddressId AND l.productregionsId = p.Id AND s.regionid = p.RegionsId and s.said =#{shipaddressesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT sa.* FROM bsp_saleaddress sa, bsp_productsregions p, bsp_productsregionssaleaddress l WHERE sa.id = l.saleaddressId AND l.productregionsId = p.Id AND sa.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND p.RegionsId=#{regionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT sa.* FROM bsp_saleaddress sa, bsp_productsregions p, bsp_productsregionssaleaddress l WHERE sa.id = l.saleaddressId AND l.productregionsId = p.Id AND p.RegionsId=#{regionsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT sa.* FROM bsp_shipaddresses s, bsp_saleaddress sa, bsp_productsregions p, bsp_productsregionssaleaddress l WHERE sa.id = l.saleaddressId AND l.productregionsId = p.Id AND s.regionid = p.RegionsId and sa.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and s.said =#{shipaddressesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
